name: squire
description: A javascript implementation of the squire COVID-19 model

scripts.build:data: npm run build:data:export && npm run build:data:test_run && npm run build:data:test_reff
scripts.build:odin: Rscript ./R/bundle.R explicit_SEIR_deterministic.R build/squire_odin.js && echo 'export function getModel() { return Object.values(odin)[0] };' >> build/squire_odin.js
scripts.build: npm run build:data && npm run build:interface

author: Imperial College London
